snippet: Marilyn Maye and Leslie Uggams were among the winners at the 11th annual ceremony honoring traditional Broadway, jazz and cabaret performers.
abstract: Stephen Holden reviews jazz and cabaret performances by winners of 11th annual New York Nightlife Awards, hosted by writer and comedian Bruce Vilanch, at Town Hall.
lead_paragraph: Marilyn Maye and Leslie Uggams were among the winners at the 11th annual ceremony honoring traditional Broadway, jazz and cabaret performers.

headline.seo: Nightlife Awards Presented at Town Hall
headline.main: Where Knowing Your Way Around a Song Trumps Youth
headline.print_headline: Where Knowing Your Way Around a Song Trumps Youth
